name: Real Pool Match Snooker 3d
description:
Welcome to the Real pool match snooker 3d. You will enjoy a nice little game of pool match in this game. Do you like to play Billiards game! This is the No.1 Pool ball game in app store. Play the Real pool match snooker 3d billiard game on your mobile and become the champion! Refine your skills in the practice arena. Take on the world in 1-vs-1 matches or enter. Real pool match snooker 3d is the outstanding classic and fabulous game pool strokes game. This champion version is the only one that contains Practice and Two Players Mode.
Classic Real pool match snooker 3d game and 100% simulation of physical pool world with great 3D visions of pool game. Compete the mission with players worldwide. Collect many stylish cues, you can play and join high-level pool tables. Exciting 1 on 1 battle. Improve your skills and defeat opponents to unlock street. Club, celebrity, city, national and international competitions. The higher tier you in, greater the bonus reward will be! Can you become the world champion? Online challenge mode against real players. Sit down in the poolroom and wait for real challenges. Can you safe your glory by defeating other challengers.
Feature:
• Realistic 3D ball animation
• Touch control for moving the stick
• 9 Ball Pool
• Single Player Mode
• VS Mode: Player vs. Computer/Player (with rules)
